channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- HOTA-Fara-B19

item.title: CVE-2022-41579|2024-08-03T12:49:43.385Z -- huawei -- hota-fara-b19
item.description: There is an insufficient authentication vulnerability in some Huawei band products. Successful exploit could allow the attacker to spoof then connect to the band.
